title: Welcome
contents:
Hello Sunshine Elites,
I have the biggest news EVER!
This spring, the elites are throwing the most exclusive Bachelorette party for our beloved queen Malini.
Do you want to crash the party? Well, you know I never disappoint.
I have insider info about the secret puzzles and codes. Solve these, and you can find out the location and attend the most private party of this season.
